thread.title: Japanese Mentaiko Spaghetti: Drunk Food So Good, You Can Eat It Sober
thread.title_full: Japanese Mentaiko Spaghetti: Drunk Food So Good, You Can Eat It Sober

author: Daniel Gritzer
title: Japanese Mentaiko Spaghetti: Drunk Food So Good, You Can Eat It Sober
text: Mentaiko spaghetti has become a classic of the Japanese-Italian kitchen, and is popular on late-night menus as an accompaniment to heavy drinking. It's also as easy as can be: a bowl of buttery noodles, tossed with spicy cured pollack roe and strips of nori. Read More
